title: How to get 550+ in the NEET in 45 days if my concepts are clear - Quora

response.answer_text: Since you say that your concepts are clear, then sky is the limit for you. Just revise all you have studied (chapter wise). Daily try to solve atleast two previous year papers and find out where you are lacking. Then try to understand those concepts too…and continue this for the next 45 days. You can easily get 600+. Best wishes for the same.
